hero.name: Ayesha Ghani
hero.tagline: Software Engineer | Full Stack | AI-driven CX
hero.oneLiner: I craft scalable backends, intuitive frontends, and AI-powered customer experiences.

majorProjects.title: Workfolio (This Portfolio)
majorProjects.problem: Needed a fast, modern, and easily extensible personal site.
majorProjects.approach: Built with React + TypeScript, Tailwind and Framer Motion; modular data in JSON; centralized Tailwind tokens in tw.ts; Vite for blazing-fast DX.
majorProjects.outcome: Responsive portfolio with animated hero, projects, side missions (GitHub API), and reusable UI primitives.
majorProjects.description: My personal portfolio showcasing major projects, side missions, and contact info. Focuses on performance, clean structure, and delightful micro‑interactions.

majorProjects.title: Prep Mentor AI
majorProjects.problem: Interview prep needs tailored practice and feedback.
majorProjects.approach: Personalized question sets, real-time AI feedback, analytics.
majorProjects.outcome: Improved user performance and tracked progress.
majorProjects.description: An AI-powered interview preparation platform that helps users practice and improve through personalized question sets, real-time feedback, and progress tracking. Includes authentication, analytics dashboard, question management, and multi-format responses.

majorProjects.title: WhatsApp Virtual Queuing Ticketing & Appointment System
majorProjects.problem: Long queues & manual bookings hurt CX.
majorProjects.approach: Java Spring Boot microservices (JWT), RabbitMQ for async, React dashboards, WhatsApp eForms replacing traditional forms.
majorProjects.outcome: Fewer manual errors, faster booking, better CX.
majorProjects.description: A unified customer interaction system using WhatsApp as the primary channel to manage tickets, virtual queues, and appointments with real-time notifications and status tracking.

majorProjects.title: AI Powered WhatsApp Chatbot
majorProjects.approach: LLM-based assistants, routing and handoff, analytics; OpenAI + LangChain.
majorProjects.outcome: Consistent brand voice and scalable support across enterprise clients.
majorProjects.description: An AI-driven WhatsApp chatbot enabling natural conversations, contextual responses, and proactive assistance with routing and analytics.

majorProjects.title: Chaincard
majorProjects.problem: Artists and collectors need easy NFT creation and discovery.
majorProjects.approach: Wallet-based auth with WalletConnect, Binance and Coinbase integrations.
majorProjects.description: An artist- and collector-focused NFT platform enabling creation, discovery, and trading of digital art with wallet-based authentication.

majorProjects.title: Kpibar Productivity Platform
majorProjects.approach: Integrates Asana, GitHub, Zeplin; RxDB and Redux for real-time/offline.
majorProjects.outcome: Single dashboard with actionable items to deliver faster.
majorProjects.description: Kpibar integrates popular tools like Asana, GitHub, and Zeplin to centralize tasks, issues, and design assets—enabling teams to plan, track, and deliver faster.

sideMissions.title: Google Keep Clone
sideMissions.description: MERN stack notes CRUD + color themes

journey.description: Backend: Java 8/17, Spring Boot, Spring Security, JWT, multithreading, RabbitMQ. Frontend: React, Redux, Hooks, Tailwind. WhatsApp CX: QR e-tickets, PDF/image delivery, dynamic eForms, feedback systems. AI: OpenAI, LangChain, custom LLM assistants. Security: Encrypted, prefilled transactional eForms for banking (cash deposits, account opening). DevOps: GitLab CI/CD, Swagger APIs.
React, Redux, RxDB; Tailwind, DaisyUI, AntD, SASS; Swagger integrations.
MERN, React, Node, .NET Core; patterns & clean code; Mongo + SQL.
Real-time React apps, reusable components, responsive features.
RN + Expo; reusable components; polished responsive interfaces.

config.description: Software Engineer specializing in scalable backends, intuitive frontends, and AI-powered customer experiences.
